metadata.title: CVE-2024-23307 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Linux Linux kernel kernelon Linux, x86, ARM (md, raid, raid5 modules) allows Forced IntegerOverflow.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
